General.Name: Sichuan Newsnet Media (Group) Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Sichuan Newsnet Media (Group) Co.,Ltd. operates in internet marketing and data service-related business in China. Its business covers current affairs news, people's livelihood information, industry information, and government affairs related information in the fields of websites, mobile newspapers, Weibo and WeChat forums, communities, and interactive TV services. The company serves government departments, institutions, and state-owned enterprises. Sichuan Newsnet Media (Group) Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Chengdu, China.
